nodes.text: The Berullian Checkpoint was a location in the galaxy where Vice Grand Administrator Prita Sven of the Galactic Empire claimed she had met the smuggler Lando Calrissian while serving as a regional administrator. Calrissian, however, had not visited the Berullian Checkpoint, and had last seen Sven on the moon Pantora.
The Berullian Checkpoint was first mentioned in the novel Last Shot, written by Daniel José Older and published in 2018.
